info.name: Spring-API-REST-Person-CRUD REST petitions
info.description:
# Requests for API REST Crud persons.

* Include: GET, DEL, PUT, POST.

item.name: 01-POST: add a new person in the DB
02-GET: retrieving all persons stored in DB

request.description:
* Retrieving all Persons using GET /api/v1.0/persons API
* localhost:8080/api/v1.0/persons/

item.name: 03-GET: retrieving a single Person by id

request.description:
* Retrieving a single Person using GET /api/v1.0/persons/{personId} API
* localhost:8080/v1.0/api/persons/1

item.name: 04- PUT: updating a Person by his id
05- DEL: deleting a Person by id stored in DB

request.description:
* Deleting a Person using DELETE /api/v1.0/persons/{personId} API
* localhost:8080/api/v1.0/persons/1
